general_provisions: This bill creates the State Sovereignty Fund.
hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>establishes the State Sovereignty Fund;<hr><ltbullet>provides for the funding, investment, and distribution of the State Sovereignty Fund; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical and conforming changes.
